ModMetaData.name: Avian Races (Puddi Edition)
ModMetaData.author: Puddi_UK
ModMetaData.description:
Avian Races (Puddi Edition) is an update of [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2596555190]Mlie's Avian Races (Continued) mod[/url], which was an update of [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1514158118]Bozu's original Avian Races mod[/url].
Unfortunately, Avian Races (Puddi Edition) does not support versions of Rimworld below 1.5.
The mod adds seven avian races and factions: [ul] [li]Owls[/li] [li]Cassowarys[/li] [li]Chickens[/li] [li]Vultures[/li] [li]Parrots[/li] [li]Dodos[/li] [li]Penguins[/li] [/ul]
[b]Avian Races (Puddi Edition) requires the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=839005762]Humanoid Alien Races 2.0 mod[/url].[/b]
